sentences.english: If don't get a period for several months, you may have what's known as post-pill amenorrhea.

sentences.english: Excess androgens can cause irregular or absent ovulation and menstruation.

sentences.english: This is a natural (though not fail-safe) method of birth control known as the Lactation Amenorrhoea Method.

sentences.english: Secondary amenorrhoea implies a gynaecological disorder or a general cause or disease.

sentences.english: How does functional sex amenorrhoea use treatment of injection of corpus luteum ketone?
